name: thomas dunnavant
text: I've been seeing Ms Emily for a couple months.  And, she has been helpful in providing me some new tools to deal with issues surrounding the death of my mother that knocked my train off the track.  While I cannot say that I am ready for the Cannon Ball Express, I am feeling so much better since i met her.  I have been treated with dignity and grace and recommend her without question.

name: Huệ Định
text: Nice scenery and friendly people.

name: Liz Nguyen
text: Beautiful, serene peaceful place. You will feel enlightened and at peace here.

name: Kim Ho
text: The Lien Tri monastery is so beautiful and peaceful. I highly recomend everyone and travelers to visit. The head monk is very tallentic and kind. I love to come back to visit again. Thank you for the your service, Thay.😊

name: Robert Bigelow
text: I would like to know why someone would give a one star review but leave no comment? This is a beautiful and peaceful place.

name: David Pham
text:
(Translated by Google) The pagoda at Lien Tri pagoda is beautiful
This is the center of cultural exchanges of our Vietnamese people in the US. Here our countrymen have the opportunity to sit close together and face each other
🙏🙏🙏
When traveling far away, everyone remembers about their homeland. When we go to the temple we each feel extremely warm and peaceful.
It is so happy to be away from home and we have a place to return to. 💐🌷🌹🌸🥰🥰🥰.
The lovely and kind teachers must be the ideal place for those who want to find a peaceful place. 🙏🙏🙏

(Original)
Chùa tại mỹ chùa Liên Trì
Đây là trung tâm giao lưu văn hoá của người Việt chúng ta tại mỹ. Ở đây đồng hương chúng ta có cơ hội ngồi lại gần bên nhau và cùng hướng về cho nhau
🙏🙏🙏
Khi đi xa xứ ai ai cũng nhớ về quê hương. Khi đến chùa mỗi chúng ta cảm thấy vô cùng ấm áp và bình yên.
Thật là hạnh phúc khi xa xứ mà chúng ta có nơi để trở về. 💐🌷🌹🌸🥰🥰🥰.
Các quý thầy nhân từ dễ thương chắc hẳn đây là vùng lý tưởng cho những ai muốn tìm về nơi bình yên. 🙏🙏🙏

name: DJ Colorsprings
text:
(Translated by Google) Lien Vien Lien Tri is a famous name for those who want to come to the temple and learn later and immediately with the staircase. The male cave, Change the View, so that the Study changes safely and makes sense for everyone.

(Original)
Tu Vien Lien Tri la mot noi tuyet voi danh cho nhung ai muon den dung chan nghi ngoi va tu tap sau nhung ngay lam viec cang thang moi met. Hang nam, Thay Quang Kien to chuc nhung ky Tu Hoc thay la an lac va y nghia cho moi nguoi.

name: Caitlin Shostak Lotz
text: If you feel frustrated and misunderstood by "most" therapists, I would highly recommend Joel. He has a sixth sense for understanding people and the ability to tap into the best thing about them. I have the privilege of knowing Joel personally. I can attest that he is truly a brilliant, imaginative and original thinker.

name: Caleb Young
text: Joel is such a warm, witty and compassionate human being. Anyone seeking a therapist that will truly see you as a person can stop searching cause you’ve find him. 5/5 and I actively recommend to friends and family.

name: Andy Philpo
text: Joel is an insightful and intelligent human being who you can trust to help you process and understand the complexities of your inner self. Come away deeper self knowledge and self mastery, which in turn leads you to a more peaceful life and more fulfilling personal or professional relationships.

name: Andrew Lotz
text: Joel is the most empathetic and intelligent person I know. He has an uncanny ability to understand people. If you need someone to really "get you," this is the place.

name: Wil Heflin
text: Joel Blackstock is a talented, kind, and empathetic therapist. He is clearly passionate about helping others and wants the best for his clients’ outcomes. He is trained in EMDR to help with ptsd and incorporates it along with his years of experience into the process.

name: Jonathan Chesney
text: Joel is thoughtful, curious, insightful, well-trained, and cares deeply about people in general and his patients health and well-being  in specific.  If you’ve been considering therapy and counseling, or just need to talk to someone about how those things might help, I recommend giving him a try!

name: Thomas Kozak
text: No pre-formed assumptions here.  Joel Blackstock meets you where you're at, and he responds to the unique nuances of every individual.

name: Teria Fuller
text: Joel is extremely trustworthy.   I feel free to talk with him about anything and not be judged.

name: Celese Sanders
text: Christine was absolutely wonderful! She took the time to really understand my pain and what would help. She is very skilled and when I left I felt like I could already tell a huge difference and the next day I felt the best I had felt in such a long time! I am so grateful I found them!

name: Richard B
text: Sarah gave a great massage! It was a good balance of full-body massage, relaxation, and addressed the trouble spots and knots. Table was very comfortable and heated. Sarah did not talk much, which I appreciated. Nice location and facility.

resp.text: So glad you enjoyed your experience at Healing Haven. Thank you for the awesome review...we look forward to seeing you again soon;-)

name: Hailee Walls
text: Renae is an amazing massage therapist! As a massage therapist myself, it is challenging sometimes to find someone whose work you love. But Renae's myofascial work feels great, and she is very intuitive and can truly feel what is going on in the body with her hands - she's like magic! I'll definitely be back.

name: Lisa Smith
text: Visits to Healing Haven are a relaxing and serene experience. Christine is very knowledgeable in how massage therapy can help her clients and incorporates the modalities you need at each visit. The setting is peaceful and calming, it is a place to treat yourself and help keep your body in its healthiest state!

name: Larry Larry
text: This is definitely a 10/10 location. I can’t say enough about the pleasant and relaxing atmosphere as you walk-in. In the mist of COVID I recognize immediately  the care and precautions.  Mrs.Grass was awesome. Has my highest recommendations.

resp.text: Thank you Larry for your 5 star recommendation! We appreciate you and your business and look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Nancy Wesson
text: I got a great massage here yesterday. The place I regularly go to was closed. After reading the reviews I made an appointment at Healing Heaven. I am glad I did. I would highly recommend this place.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the 5 star review! We are glad you were pleased with your service. We hope to see you again soon!

name: Nick P
text: Great deep tissue massage.  Renae was excellent.  The facility was very clean and welcoming.  The table was solid and one of the better places I have been for a massage.  I felt very comfortable and will definitely be going back in the near future.

name: Raven Babineaux
text: Best massage I've ever had, she actually used pressure that was needed as well as massaged all muscles. She worked on the knots in my back (much needed),  explained the process and discussed my intake form with me with all medical information. Oh and she actually explained the issues she discovered with me which has never occurred anywhere else I've been. Love this place they are very professional and informative.

name: Adrienne Walker
text: 10/10 would recommend. Christine was just a great person and really made me feel comfortable. She was solely interested in making you and your body feel ten times better than when you walk in. Thanks!

name: Ken Crowson
text: Kinda Leary at first but once I got there very comfortable and it was great can’t wait till next session very professional and knowledgeable about the body would highly recommend Christine she was great

name: R
text: I have gone to Christine about a half a dozen times now. She has helped me immensely. I have been to other massage therapist, to include some of the massage mills who shall remain nameless, and found Christine is very well versed in her profession. Every time I go there I learn something new. She has helped me with an alignment issue I was having by showing me a number of stretches to correct it. Christine also utilizes essential oils in her therapy and has the ability to find and release all the muscular tension build-up in my body. I sleep like a baby after one of her massage session. And above all, Christine is a lovely and caring person who believes in helping others!

name: Colby Robinson
text: I visited Christine at Healing Haven recently for my first ever massage and I had a fantastic experience. When I stepped into her office it was like I left all my stress at the door. She was excellent at making me feel comfortable and relaxed. Not only was the massage a great experience, but she used essential oils to make it even better. If you are looking to have body work done, I definitely recommend visiting Christine.

resp.text: We're so glad you had such a positive experience with us and look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Brandon Patterson
text: Excellent service! I don't know where to start with how much their service made my weekend. Absolutely impressed with the quality and I can't wait to go again!

name: Randy Lee
text: Christine is very knowledgeable and highly skilled. Definitely one if the best massage experiences I have had. I highly recommend Healing Haven and Christine.

name: Rachelle Griffin
text: Our boss hired this place to come and give us 15 minute chair massages and it was great the lady doing the massages was really nice down to earth and generally cared about making you feel better I will be visiting the business for sure

resp.text: Hi Rachelle, thank you for the great review. It was our pleasure to come out to your place of work for your employee appreciation week to help make you feel better. We hope to be back again soon!

name: Dianne Judson
text: Amazing and serene experience!

name: Laura Hardin
text: Christine has been my massage therapist for three years now. Every single session has been excellent. She continues to provide fabulous service.

name: Cameron Claire Starnes
text: Christine is amazing!!  I was having a lot of pain and she helped me greatly!  I highly recommend her services.

resp.text: We appreciate your positive review Cameron and we're glad our services delivered what you needed. Cya later!

name: Art Of Valor
text: Great place to meditate, chill, relax and observe some of the most beautiful scenery the state of Alabama and the South has to offer. The city of Piedmont is nearby. One of America's hidden gems in my opinion. Love going here on a bad day and listening to nature speak. This place makes a good day even better. If you're in the Piedmont, Alabama area, you don't want to miss out on this wonderful place!

name: Nikki Palmer
text: Great meditation center! After about 1 minute of the breathing technique I was mind blown at the instant results, I recommend the Wim Hof method to everyone it only takes 10 minutes and its results you can feel. The mountains were great also!!💖 the best part is its all free!!!

name: Sean Lyle
text: Always a good place to be

name: adam dasinger
text: 2nd highest mountain in the State of Alabama. The drive up FS 500 is worth your time.

name: Buddha Bishop
text: Great place to camp and getaway from it all

name: Jason Jackson
text: Beautiful rugged wild

name: Wanda M.
text: Love the mountains

name: Dustin Walker
text: Beautiful place

name: Zachary Wilson
text: An amazing place to be. I am truly grateful this exists with the upmost goal to share love and kindness.

resp.text: Dear Zachary, Thank you so much for your kindness and gratitude. We are always honored to meet and share inner peace with like minded individuals. Thank You for being such a great peace seeker in this world and joining our mission of changing ourselves to change the world. Wishing you good health, peace and happiness always. Look forward to meditating with you again dear friend :) _()_  - Nena

name: Dwanda Schwarz
text: This is a very happy and positive place! I meditate both at home and here at the center. Its a different experience meditating in a group setting, there is more energy and feels uplifting. Very Motivating! Its wonderful to have the opportunity to have a setting to meet with others and socialize. And the Meditation Center of AL definitely does a fantastic job of offering a great place to do just that!

resp.text: Dear Dwanda, Thank you so much for your very kind review and joining our meditation center. We are so grateful to you for all your volunteer work to help spread peace and love in the community. You have forever inspired us with your presence. Thank you so much _()_ Love always, Nena

name: jayashankar Devanga Manjunath
text: I am going to MEDITATION CENTER OF ALABAMA from Past 2 years and the Host Nena Nimit and Her Mom are doing extraordinary service to the community in spreading peace thru Guided meditation . I had little work pressure and after started going to Meditation I was so Happy and became more productive in office . I made many friends and talked to grate personalities and teachers who share their experience. Thank you all  volunteers who are working so hard and dedication.

resp.text: Thank you so much Jay for joining our center and bringing so many beautiful friends with you _()_ You are a great light for our community and it is an honor to be able to know you and meditate with you. Rejoice in all your good deeds and keep shining our dear peace brother :) _()_

name: Daniel Day
text:
Meditation has brought much peace and clarity, to my day to day life.
Joining this meditation center, becoming a volunteer and being accepted, as one of This centers "Peace family" members. I have found and been given, so much
more  "through loving kindness and generosity" than I was seeking.  Coming here each week, to sit and rest "body and mind" has passed far beyond a joy or pleasure. To be a part of this, I would call a blessing. 🙏💕🙏💕🙏

resp.text: Dear Daniel, Thank you so much for your kind comment. You are our light and joy and peace :) Thank you for shining so brightly and inspiring us all with your presence. You are a true one in a million peace brother and it is a great honor to know you and walk along this beautiful path with you. Satu satu saaaatu peace bear _()_ =D <3

name: Nena Nimit
text: I have been a student and volunteer at the Meditation Center for over a decade now. This is the most kind, loving and generous, positive and uplifting meditation center I have ever been to. All the peace seekers and volunteers have become my family and I truly could not imagine life without them. The Meditation Center saved my life while I was struggling to find balance in medical school and going through many stressors in  life. Mindfulness has helped me deal with anxiety and day to day stressors. The classes give me a consistent structure to keep up my practice and the teachers have helped me to greatly to progress in my meditation. The meditation retreats and special peace events are some of the most positive memories of my life. I am so thankful to the director, all the students, peace family and sangha that gather here every week to support each other along the path to inner peace and happiness. This small microcosm of different people from different backgrounds, religions and walks of life gathering together in kindness and peace has shown me that it is true. Sustainable world peace can be achieved when each individual person finds their own inner peace and balance in life. I am forever grateful to the Meditation Center of Alabama. Thank you.

resp.text: Thank you Nena!! Much loving kindness, The Meditation Center of Alabama

name: Felicher Jones
text: A great place to go to learn how to meditate! Very warm and friendly atmosphere! It is like going to the united nation because the people who attend are very diverse! I feel very welcome. The space and people are peaceful and beautiful! The instructor spend time with the newcomers to instruct them on meditation while the others do stretch warm up to prepare to meditate. Warm tea is served then everyone come together for a group meditation. Some people sit on the floor , some people sit on chairs depend on their preference. After the meditation session people share their experiences and questions are answered then a meal is served and we fellowship. Great place to meet and mingle.

resp.text: Dear Felicher, Thank you so much for joining our center with your family! You are all so incredibly inspiring, strong, courageous and bright rolde models of peace in this world. You have given us so much with your presence and loving kindness. We could not be more grateful to have met you. Thank you for everything _()_ Much love, The Meditation Center of Alabama :) <3

name: Warunyaporn Sumrittikul
text: This is the best place to meditate in Mobile! I had an amazing meditation experience which help calm my mind and my thoughts down after a long rush day. And people there just are amazing! This is not just a meditation center, but a place where people gather together and help encouraging each other like a family! I’m highly recommend this place!💛❤️💙

resp.text: awww Thank you so much Ms. Warunyaporn for your kind review!! We greatly enjoyed having you at the meditation center and thank you from the bottom of our hearts for being one of the most amazing students and volunteers we have ever had. We are so grateful to you for your loving kindness. Alabama sends our love to you always ka _()_ Rejoice in all your good deeds! Satu kaaa! =D _()_ <3 Nena

name: Peace maker
text: I have found peacefulness and calm in my life through daily meditation. The meditation center has guided me to this path. Through the practice of loving kindness and an easy to do method. The people who meditate together encourage me to continue in my practice. I have been very blessed to be part of this family.

resp.text: Thank you so much Peace maker for your kind comment. We are so grateful to have met you many years ago. Your presence in our lives is absolutely priceless and a joy. You bring happiness and peace with lots of laughs and smiles to all of us the moment you enter the room. We cannot thank you enough for shining so brightly and sharing your peace with us all. You inspire all of us with your presence. Satu satu saaatu peace brother _()_ We love you :)

name: Nandi Cole
text: The meditation center with Dr. Nena also with everyone alongside her, are all so welcoming! Their very personable while being very helpful! I love this place.

resp.text: Dear Nandi, You are so kind! Thank you so much for your kind words and being a part of our peace community. You and your friends are a bright bright light and have inspired us all many times over. You are truly a beautiful soul. Thank you so much and be blessed always =D <3 _()_

name: Forrest Neal
text: Dr. Nena truly helped me overcome a lot of the difficulties I was facing in my life using meditation! She was the perfect person I needed to help me and I’m so thankful to have her as such a great friend in my life! 😁🙏

resp.text: Dear Forrest, It is You who have inspired us and brought so much light to us. We cannot thank you enough for the great joy and honor of knowing you a very special and beloved peace brother. We miss you and love you always. Our doors are always open for you. Best of luck and hope to connect soon =D Love, Meditation Center of Alabama

name: Candice Dunston
text: I love meditating with this diverse, kind community. I'm at peace the minute I walk through the door. 😊☮💕

resp.text: Thank you so much Candice for your kind review!! We are so grateful to have met you and have you as part of our peace family _()_ Much loving kindness =D <3

name: Alex Saint-Paul
text: when I was living in Mobile I enjoyed going to the meditation center. The meditation center is a great place for meditation and is quite welcoming as well.

resp.text: Dear Alex, Thank you so much for your kind review! We miss you and it was a pleasure and honor to get to know you while you were here. Hope that you continue meditating and cultivating peace from within. Thank you for sharing your light. Satu =D <3

name: Willy Nilly
text: I’m so thankful for Dr. Nena in the community of Mobile. Her and her family surely are gifts and I’m so thankful to be a part of their wonderful community!

resp.text: Dear Willy, Thank you so much for your extremely kind review. We are so grateful you have joined us and wish you all the best in peace, happiness and brightness inside and out. Much loving kindness, The Meditation Center of Alabama

name: c herring
text: About 7 years ago I was extremely stressed out. My Blood Pressure was 243/132... I got meds from my doctor that helped some. I saw a Flyer on a 3 Day Meditation Retreat. I needed rest so I thought I would try it. I was Welcomed Overwhelmly by Volunteers and Professionals. Doctor Nena sat down with me for a rather lengthy discussion on my Stress. With her Advice and the Lectures I was able to learn how to recognize when my Stress was coming on and Stop it before it got out of hand. Her and the entire "Meditation Family" has helped me though Very Difficult times. The passing of my Dad is just one example of their Support. If it wasn't for me attending The 3 Day Retreat....I know without a Doubt that I would not be here today. I can not give this Group just 5 Stars and 10 Stars would still not be Enough. Their Love and Compassion goes Far Beyound That.

resp.text: Dear Charly, We give you 1 million stars. Our incredible peace brother who has brought so much joy, acts of kindness, compassion, light and peace to us all. .You light up the room and are a beloved member of our peace family. Thank you for sharing your journey with us. Love always, Meditation Center of Alabama <3 =D _()_
